title: Breaking Down Qualcomm's Revenue Streams To Understand How They Make Money - Nasdaq.com
text: Qualcomm   ( QCOM  ) is one of the largest semiconductor and telecommunications equipment companies, that designs and markets wireless telecommunications products and services. It derives most of its revenue from chipmaking and the bulk of its profit from its patent licensing businesses.
You can view the Trefis interactive dashboard -  Qualcomm Revenue: How does Qualcomm make   money?   - You can modify our key drivers to arrive at your own estimates for the company's revenue.
According to Qualcomm Valuation   by Trefis, we have a price estimate of $86 per share for QCOM's stock.
